title: Twitch Says It Will Reduce Payments for Many Popular Streamers
description: The video game streaming service is struggling to strike the right balance between popularity and profit.

title: Regulators Accuse Amazon of Singling Out Union Organizers for Discipline
description: National Labor Relations Board officials said the company had applied its workplace rules unfairly, and asked it to change or scrap the regulations.

title: C.E.O. of Kraken, the Cryptocurrency Exchange, Steps Down
description: Jesse Powell, the chief executive, has battled with employees after posting messages about race and gender and urging those who disagreed with his values to leave.

title: F.D.A. Warning on NyQuil Chicken Alerts Many to Existence of NyQuil Chicken
description: Cooking poultry in cold medicine is a bad, dangerous idea that few people seemed to be aware of until the government warning attracted media coverage.

title: New System Aims to Save Whales Near San Francisco From Ship Collisions
description: Four whales have died near San Francisco this year after ships crashed into them, and scientists hope to drive that number to zero with new technology.

title: The Settings That Make Smartphones Easier for Everyone to Use
description: The accessibility features Apple and Google include in their mobile software can help people of all abilities get more from their devices.
